A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (Spoiler free) Deeply disappointing and a huge let down after The Force Awakens (TFA). The Last Jedi (TLJ) really dropped the ball and wasted all of the momentum\, goodwill\, hopefulness\, and possibilities\, that were set up in TFA. And the damage this film does to the future of this franchise is likely irreparable. But ... we will see what JJ Abrams can do with episode 9. It's much clearer after the hot mess of TLJ how great of a job Abrams did with TFA. TLJ missess the mark badly in terms of pacing\, plot\, character development\, humor\, and dialogue. TLJ was a bunch of empty calories. Overall TLJ ranks up there with the prequels in terms of over all badness/disappointment but for different reasons.
